channel.title: Moparscape - Scripting API: A Basic Overview
channel.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S4rIFzLWFdA
I hope you enjoy and if you have any questions let me know. The example script produced in the video is listed below. Excuse the raspy voice. I'm getting a smokers cough.
[code=lua] function a(plr, item, option) plr:message('Hello') plr:delay(2) plr:message('Goodbye') end
function b(plr) plr:delay(2) -- Wait 1.2 sec plr:call(c) -- Call function 'c' end
function c(plr) plr:message('Hello!') end
function d(plr) local fork = plr:fork() fork:delay(2) fork:call(e) end
function e(fork, plr) plr:heal(5) fork:delay(2) fork:call(e) end
app.on(entity.state[death], insert_id_here, function(npc, state) -- Do stuff here end) [/code]

item.title: Moparscape - Scripting API: A Basic Overview
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S4rIFzLWFdA

I hope you enjoy and if you have any questions let me know. The example script produced in the video is listed below. Excuse the raspy voice. I’m getting a smokers cough.

function a(plr, item, option)
    plr:message('Hello')
    plr:delay(2)
    plr:message('Goodbye')
end

function b(plr)
 plr:delay(2)   -- Wait 1.2 sec
 plr:call(c)    -- Call function 'c'
end

function c(plr)
    plr:message('Hello!')
end

function d(plr)
    local fork = plr:fork()
    fork:delay(2)
    fork:call(e)
end

function e(fork, plr)
    plr:heal(5)
    fork:delay(2)
    fork:call(e)
end

app.on(entity.state[death], insert_id_here, function(npc, state)
    -- Do stuff here
end)

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape - Scripting API: A Basic Overview
